title: new deployment

content: Going to Korea and the chance that it can be accompanied isn't deployment. It is PCS orders. Spouses can go if they are going to certain areas and if you pass the EFMP screening (medical and dental) and get command sponsorship. He will get unaccompanied orders to begin with for 1 year, if they will allow them to become accompanied after you go through all the screenings and get sponsorship they will be up to 3 years. There is threads in Relocation Discussion in the Military Life, Spouses and Family section about moving, one stickied to the top of the Relocation forum is "Going to Korea". search there for information.
